tool.name: Tool4

param.name: cases
param.dialogReference: CSV file of CASES summary statistic. Should match the statistic chosen for controls.

param.name: calc_abb
param.displayname: Summary Exposre Type (med, accum, max, min)
param.dialogReference: Based on which summary statistic you are currently analyzing. Enter the abbreviation (Median = "med", Sum = "accum", Max = "max", Min = "min"). These are the only options and must be entered all lowercase.

param.name: timeframes_num2
param.dialogReference: Number of time frames you would like to run the analysis over. For example, if you enter "12," the summary statistic will be calculated for 0 years prior to diagnosis year, 1 year prior to diagnosis year, ... all the way to 12 years prior to diagnosis year.

param.name: attrib_file
param.displayname: Attribute Data File (containing controls and cases)
param.dialogReference: CSV file containing other attribute data for all cases and controls. Need columns "age" and "sex".

param.name: output_folder
param.displayname: Output folder for Window Analysis files
param.dialogReference: Folder where all non-log-transformed windows will be saved.

param.name: log_outputfolder
param.displayname: Output folder for LOG-transformed Window Analysis files
param.dialogReference: Folder where all log-transformed windows will be saved.

tool.summary: This tool takes case and control summary exposure csvs and runs a rolling window analysis on them. Creates both log and non-log transformed export files. Output should be a folder as there will be many csv files.
